post.text: We're hiring across the country to bring home a win in November. Apply to join our team: http://hrc.io/28q1l6n

comment.author: Erika
comment.text: Why did White House Press Secretary, Josh Earnest call the email investigation a criminal investigation????? Could it be? Is reality emerging?

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Could you be... an idiot. Yes.

replies.author: Yvonne
replies.text: Matthew I suppose all the ????? means something? But what?

replies.author: Erika
replies.text: Matthew, your blind alllegiance is indicative of the problems of this nation. This makes you the idioit. It's okay to question everything and to be informed.
